name: Crashing Balls
description:
Introduction

This game should be played under Windows 7, 8, 10, or higher system versions.

Double Click "Crashing Balls.exe" to start the game.

Players can use "A" and "D" key to control the angle of the main camera, and use "W" and "S" key to control the movement of the ball. The ball can only move forward or backward.

Picking the lightning icon allows players to crash enemies with a higher power.

Circle icons that randomly appear in the platform are portals, players can use portals to avoid enemies flank.
